description:
Continually pushed by his overbearing father, Yoji retreats to the comfort of his virtual girlfriend. When he`s offered a drug that will “change his life,” the line between reality and fiction blurs and he mistakens the new girl at work for his virtual girlfriend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: MY FAIR LADY けがれなき少女への愛
My Fair Lady: Kegarenaki Shoujo e no Ai
